about_the_game:
What's Worse Than Death? Perhaps living the rest of your life alone.

Both Holly and Mia have tragic histories with the macabre that they just can't escape. When a popular dating app brings these two together for the most unlikely reason, will sparks fly? Or just blood?

Find out in this dramatic horror/romance comic book series, based on the Worse Than Death video game!

About this DLC
  • the official comic-book sequel to Worse Than Death
  • collects the first three chapters (50 pages of story!)
  • includes Steam-exclusive bonus feature: puzzle hints and answers for the Worse Than Death game!

How to view the DLC

The Worse Than Death comic book DLC is provided as a DRM-free PDF. It's automatically downloaded to the main game directory on your PC or Mac.

To access it:

1. After purchasing the DLC, launch the Steam client
2. In your game Library, you should see that the base Worse Than Death game will receive an update. If it does, skip to 3. If it does not:
2a. You can right-click on the Worse Than Death tile and click Properties...
2b. Within Properties, click on Updates, then Always keep this game updated, and choose Always keep this game updated (or the High Priority option) to make sure Steam downloads the DLC.

3. Once Worse Than Death has been updated, right-click on its tile in your Library and choose Properties... (if you don't have it open already).
4. Click on Local Files
5. Click on Browse... to view the game files in Explorer (Windows) or Finder (macOS)
6. Find the PDF called Worse Than Death - Volume 01 SE and double-click to open it, or copy it to a more convenient location

content_descriptors.notes: This comic-book story features some depictions of violence, blood and gore, though it aims not to be overtly grotesque.
